content.rendered:
Stay Sterling.

Specially formulated for grey and white strands, the Oribe illuminating shampoo undoes dullness and yellow ones, revealing softer, brighter, perpetually vibrant hair.

Key Ingredients & Benefits:

  • Oribe Signature Complex (Lychee, Watermelon and Edelweiss Flower Extracts): Defends hair from oxidative stress, all while protecting from the drying, damaging and colour-depleting effects of the elements.
  • Blend of Blue & Silver pigments: Brighten grey and silver hair, eliminate yellow tones and prevent discolouration.
  • European Silver Fir Extract: Intensely hydrates to protect against pollution and free radical damage while preventing the signs of premature ageing.
